conversation.text: Hey, have you ever played this game Dragon Fire XII?
I can guarantee you have not played pretty much any of the games you have.

Dude, you're missing out. It's got this bonkers combat system where you need to manually select what your characters shout when they attack, and it's fully voice acted. It's like the game is constantly screaming at you.
No it rules. There's also real-time travel times so it takes like five or six hours to get from one town to another.
Where do you find the time to play this shit even?
